mapper.select:
SELECT goods_id AS "goodsiI", goods_name AS "goodsName", goods_brand AS "goodsBrand", goodsPrice AS "goodsPrice", goodsPurchsLink AS "goodsPurchsLink", goodsKwrd AS "goodsKwrd", goodsRegistDate AS "goodsRegistDate", goodsUpdateDate AS "goodsUpdateDate", goodsDeleteYn AS "goodsDeleteYn"
FROM goods
